pr_title: Remove assert for unlisted exceptions in the protocol

timeline.message:
Remove assert for unlisted exceptions in the protocol

Assertion is removed because we don't want to rely on the
users disabling exceptions. A user if enable exceptions
could get asserts.

(cherry picked from commit ee5f75e206f800f12a1652355df407e533251225)

timeline.bodyText: nit: looks like we can remove checkClassNameForValidity method now.
timeline.author: puzpuzpuz
